content: *free on blog designed for the 2020 moogly ca 1 l this soothing mandala will help you attain serenity now using a variety of stitches - popcorn post stitches clusters and crocodile stitch you will have fun combining your colors into your own unique work check out all the free patterns in the moogly cal this year thank you to yarnspirations for the yarn support free copy of pattern on my blog julie yeager designs 2 yarn amounts used a aran 40 g b dusty purple 10 g c cameo 20 g d lettuce 20 g 1 mooglyblog com 2 http //julieyeagerdesigns com/serenity-now-afghan-block/
